template_input_params.name: bastion_host
template_input_params.description: Bastion host for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion host

template_input_params.name: bastion_port
template_input_params.description: Bastion port for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion port

template_input_params.name: bastion_user
template_input_params.description: Bastion user for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion user

template_input_params.name: bastion_private_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion private key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion private key

template_input_params.name: bastion_password
template_input_params.description: Bastion user password for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion user password

template_input_params.name: bastion_host_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion host public key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion host key

template_input_params.name: mcm_controller_server_name
template_input_params.description: Server name of a IBM MCM controller to register the managed OpenShift cluster.
template_input_params.label: Server name of IBM MCM controller.

template_input_params.name: mcm_controller_admin_user
template_input_params.description: IBM MCM controller administrator user name.
template_input_params.label: IBM MCM controller Admin User Name

template_input_params.name: mcm_controller_admin_user_password
template_input_params.description: IBM MCM controller administrator password.
template_input_params.label: IBM MCM controller Admin Password

template_input_params.name: import_launch_node_ip
template_input_params.description: IP address of the node to execute import of a ICP cluster to IBM MCM controller. This can be ICP boot node.
template_input_params.label: Import Launch Node IP

template_input_params.name: vm_os_user
template_input_params.description: The user name to connect to the import launch node.
template_input_params.label: Import Launch Node User Name

template_input_params.name: vm_os_password
template_input_params.description: The user password to connect to the import launch node. Either the password or the private key should be provided.
template_input_params.label: Import Launch Node User Password

template_input_params.name: vm_os_private_key
template_input_params.description: Base64 encoded private SSH key to connect to the import launch node. Either the password or the private key should be provided.
template_input_params.label: Import Launch Node User User Private SSH Key (base64 encoded)
template_input_params.regexdesc: Value must be a base64 encoded string. Can contain A-Z, a-z, and 0-9, and padding = characters.

template_input_params.name: ocp_server_url
template_input_params.description: OpenShift Server URL with port. Example: https://a.b.c:8443
template_input_params.label: OpenShift Server URL

template_input_params.name: ocp_admin_user
template_input_params.description: OpenShift administrator user name.
template_input_params.label: OpenShift Admin User Name

template_input_params.name: ocp_admin_pass
template_input_params.description: OpenShift administrator user password.
template_input_params.label: OpenShift Admin User Password

template_input_params.name: rhsm_user
template_input_params.description: Red Hat Subscription Manager Account Username
template_input_params.label: Red Hat Subscription Manager Account Username

template_input_params.name: rhsm_password
template_input_params.description: Red Hat Subscription Manager Account Password
template_input_params.label: Red Hat Subscription Manager Account Password

template_input_params.name: cluster_server_host
template_input_params.description: IBM Cloud Private managed cluster console URL with port. Example: https://a.b.c:8443.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP Console URL

template_input_params.name: cluster_name
template_input_params.description: IBM Cloud Private Cluster Name on managed cluster.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP Cluster Name
template_input_params.regexdesc: Cluster name must be alpha numeric and can have dots and dash. Maximum length is 80 characters.

template_input_params.name: icp_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Managed ICP cluster administrator user name.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP Admin User Name

template_input_params.name: icp_admin_pass
template_input_params.description: Managed ICP administrator password.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP Admin Password

template_input_params.name: icp_inception_image
template_input_params.label: ICP Inception Image on managed cluster
template_input_params.description: Name of the bootstrap installation image on managed cluster.

template_input_params.name: icp_dir
template_input_params.description: Provide ICP Install Directory of managed cluster if the import launch node is boot or boot master node. If this value is not provided, config.yaml file used for installation would not be updated.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP Install Directory.

template_input_params.name: man_cluster_on_hub
template_input_params.description: Name that will be used to identify the managed ICP cluster on target IBM MCM controller. If not provided a name would be generated based on cluster name.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP name to set on the target IBM MCM controller
template_input_params.regexdesc: Name must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters or '-', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character.

template_input_params.name: cluster_docker_registry_server_name
template_input_params.description: ICP Private docker registry server name used for loading the MCM docker images into. Required only if you are using private registry.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP Private Docker Registry Server Name
template_input_params.regexdesc: Server name must be alpha numeric and can have dots and dash. Maximum length is 80 characters.

template_input_params.name: cluster_docker_registry_server_ip
template_input_params.description: ICP Private docker registry IP used for loading the MCM docker images into. Required only if you are using private registry.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP Private Docker Registry Server IP

template_input_params.name: cluster_docker_registry_server_port
template_input_params.description: ICP Private docker registry server port, used for loading the MCM docker images into. Required only if you are using private registry.
template_input_params.label: Managed ICP Private Docker Registry Server Port
template_input_params.regexdesc: Must be an integer value between 0 and 65535.

template_input_params.name: cluster_docker_registry_server_ca_crt
template_input_params.description: Base64 encoded ICP Private docker registry server CA certificate.
template_input_params.label: ICP Private docker registry server CA certificate (base64 encoded)
template_input_params.regexdesc: Value must be a base64 encoded string. Can contain A-Z, a-z, and 0-9, and padding = characters.
